Foundation Crack Repair Toronto

Stop Water Leaks Permanently with Professional Crack Injection

Expert foundation crack repair in Toronto. Polyurethane & epoxy injection, 25-year warranty, same-day service. Stop leaks permanently. Call (437) 545-0067.

Professional Foundation Crack Repair in Toronto

Don't let small cracks become big problems

Foundation cracks are more than just cosmetic issues—they're entry points for water that can cause extensive damage to your home. Our professional injection repair services seal cracks permanently, preventing water infiltration and protecting your foundation.

Actively Leaking Crack?

Water coming through your foundation crack needs immediate attention. Our emergency team is available 24/7.

Call Now: (437) 545-0067 - Average response time: 45 minutes

Types of Foundation Cracks We Repair

Each crack type requires a specific repair approach

Vertical Cracks

Most common type, usually from settling or curing

Horizontal Cracks

Step Cracks

Diagonal Cracks

Often from differential settling of foundation

Spider Web Cracks

Active Leaking Cracks

Understanding Crack Repair Costs

Transparent pricing with no hidden fees

Foundation crack repair costs vary based on several factors. Most repairs range from $500-$1,500, making it one of the most cost-effective waterproofing solutions available.

Factors Affecting Cost

Crack Length

Longer cracks require more injection material

Crack Width

Wider cracks may need special preparation

Location Access

Hard-to-reach areas may increase labor time

Number of Cracks

Multiple crack discounts available

Save Money

Bundle multiple crack repairs for discounts up to 20%. We also offer 0% financing for repairs over $1,000.

Frequently Asked Questions

Is crack injection a permanent fix?

Yes, when properly done. Our polyurethane injection creates a flexible, waterproof seal that moves with your foundation. Combined with our 25-year warranty, you can trust the repair will last.

Can I paint over the repaired crack?

Absolutely. Once cured, the injection ports are removed and the surface is smoothed. You can paint, apply waterproofing coatings, or finish your basement walls as desired.

Do you repair cracks in block foundations?

Yes, we repair cracks in both poured concrete and concrete block foundations. Block foundations may require a different approach, but we have solutions for all foundation types.

What if the crack is actively leaking?

Active leaks are our specialty. We use fast-setting polyurethane that can stop flowing water immediately. Our emergency team is available 24/7 for urgent leak situations.

Don't Ignore These Warning Signs

  • • Water stains along crack lines
  • • Efflorescence (white powder) near cracks
  • • Cracks wider than 1/8 inch
  • • Multiple cracks in same area
  • • Horizontal cracks (urgent!)
  • • Cracks that are growing
  • • Musty smell in basement
  • • Visible water during rain
